data.name: RPG Maker MV - Crimson Towers Battlepack
data.detailed_description:
From narrow corridors filled with vampires and werevolves to shadowy ramparts infested by swooping garoyle bats, Crimson Towers are a perilous leg of your adventurer's journey. Crimson Towers Battlepack is a pint-sized addition to the wealth of free and paid material Michael Rookard has shared over the years - and it does not disappoint.

With 8 enemies and 3 new battlebacks, Crimson Towers Battlepack is a fantastic addition to your growing library of RPG Maker Resources.

Features:
  • 5 unique enemies, with variations for a total of 8 enemy graphics.
  • 3 matching thematic battle backgrounds.
  • Expertly painted and designed by Michael Rookard.
  • Imaginative and inspired by both modern fantasy and clasic monster archetypes.
  • Formatted for use in RPG Maker MV.

data.short_description: With 8 enemies and 3 new battlebacks, Crimson Towers Battlepack is a fantastic addition to your growing library of RPG Maker Resources.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with OpenGL
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)
